RPMapping.sourceAttrName: concat( 'Hardware ', @ID, ', which contains a hardware bundle service, has an articleNumber (', */articleNumber, '), which is not defined for hardware bundle. See GENERAL_CODE_ITEM, GROUP_CODE = HW_ART_DES')
